description.value:
The grand curator of the library uses the lantern's might to forever capture any roaming soul that lingered in the halls of the library. If you listen closely, you can still hear the agony and screams of the souls trapped inside

Many of the writers of the books that are still in the library have actually returned as ghosts in order to watch how many would buy their books. Many of them grew angry as they saw their book not getting picked up. It was the grand curator's job to trap those souls so that they do not bother the library's visitors.

Use, 1/week: Often used in the dark, its azure light is capable of revealing any invisible creature and object.

The grand curator, sees all.
